featureImplementations.implementation: Default language French (postal code 1700), with URL-based routing (/de, /fr, /it, /en) for translations
Modal appears on page load with localStorage check to only show once per session, contains draft preview warning
Single-page layout with anchor links and smooth scroll behavior to each section
Mobile-first approach with breakpoints at 768px (tablet) and 1024px (desktop)
Download provided logo from staticlocal.ch and store in assets directory, use as both header logo and favicon
Title: Jean Marie Coiffure & Onglerie - Fribourg, Description: Salon de coiffure et onglerie à Fribourg, Open Graph tags for social sharing
Embed Google Maps or OpenStreetMap centered on coordinates 46.799288, 7.153035
Phone numbers as tel: links for mobile users

additionalNotes: This is a beauty salon in Fribourg, Switzerland offering hair styling, nail care, and body treatments including the unique Colombian Lifting service. The design should evoke elegance, femininity, and professionalism with warm, sophisticated colors. The dusty rose primary color and gold secondary accent reflect the beauty industry while maintaining a modern, clean aesthetic. Playfair Display for headings adds elegance while Lato provides excellent readability for body text. The single-page layout ensures fast loading and easy navigation. All services should be clearly presented without emojis as specified. Contact is via phone only - no contact form required.
